findings.title: Timely accrue the interest before calculating the share price
findings.description: Accruing interest before calculating the share price is recommended in the endWeeklySettle() routine to ensure proper settlement.

findings.title: Unspecified Medium Severity Finding
findings.description: The provided audit report fragments do not contain a specific finding titled 'Medium 1'. The fragments appear to be related to the WooSuperChargerVault contract and its weekly settlement functionality.

findings.title: Improved Weekly Settlement
findings.description: The weekly settlement implementation in WooSuperChargerVault can be improved by ensuring timely accrued interest within endWeeklySettle() before calculating share price.
